property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Evolution: Put on one of your darkness creatures. ■ Parallel Invasion: When one of your non-psychic darkness commands that costs 5 or more attacks, you may put this creature from your hyperspatial zone on top of it. {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature on a non-evolution creature, discard a card from your hand. Then choose one of your opponent's creatures. It gets -9000 power until the end of the turn. ■ Meteorburn Awaken: At the start of your turn, put all cards from under this creature into your graveyard, then flip this creature to the side with the higher cost.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {TRIPLE BREAKER} ■ Whenever this creature attacks, choose one of the following: ► Your opponent chooses 2 cards from their hand and discards them: ► Choose one of your opponent's creatures and they put a seal on it. (To seal a card, put the top card of your deck face down on it.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Evolution: Put on a darkness or fire creature. ■ S-Rank Invasion "Lightning Sonic": Darkness or Fire Command (When one of your darkness or fire commands attacks, you may put this creature from your hand, your graveyard, or the battle zone on top of it.) {TRIPLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature, your opponent puts a seal on all their creatures that have the lowest power. (To seal a card, put the top of your deck face down on it. Sealed creatures are ignored.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {TRIPLE BREAKER} ■ Whenever this creature attacks, choose one of the following: ► Your opponent chooses 2 cards from their hand and discards them: ► Choose one of your opponent's creatures and they put a seal on it. (To seal a card, put the top card of your deck face down on it.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {STRIKE BACK}-Darkness (When a Darkness card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may discard that card. If you do, cast this spell for no cost.) ■ Choose one of your opponent's creatures and they put a seal on it. {SEAL} (To seal a card, put the top card of your deck on top of that card face down. Whenever a Command is put, its owner puts a seal from one of their cards that has the same civilization as that Command into their graveyard. Sealed creatures are ignored.)

card.name: Final Forbidden Redtron, D2V3 / Forbidden Hand

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ While you are summoning this creature, you may discard a card from your hand. If you do, this creature costs 2 less to summon. ■ When you put this creature, you may choose one of your opponent's creatures. This creature and that creature battle. TWINPACT {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast/summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ Choose one of your opponent's creatures that has power 9999 or less and destroy it. ■ If you have a field, choose one of your opponent's creatures and they put a seal on it.

property.name: Rules1
property.value: ■ While you are summoning this creature, you may discard a card from your hand. If you do, this creature costs 2 less to summon. ■ When you put this creature, you may choose one of your opponent's creatures. This creature and that creature battle.

property.name: Rules2
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast/summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ Choose one of your opponent's creatures that has power 9999 or less and destroy it. ■ If you have a field, choose one of your opponent's creatures and they put a seal on it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this field, put 4 seals on it. ■ Your darkness commands, fire commands and creatures that have "Forbidden" in their name cost 2 less to summon. They can't cost less than 1. ■ Forbidden Big Bang: When this field has no seals on it, shuffle it into your deck, then return a card from your graveyard to your hand. {SEAL} (To seal a card, put the top card of your deck on top of that card face down. Whenever a Command is put, its owner puts a seal from one of their cards that has the same civilization as that Command into their graveyard. Sealed creatures are ignored.)
